title: GLOW: The Story of the Gorgeous Ladies of Wrestling
description:
You may know from the hit Netflix series, but before it was a TV show, GLOW was a documentary-- and today it's the subject of True Story! Tig and Cheryl tag team a doc chock full of memorable nicknames, good girls and bad girls, and much more! ALSO, True Story has a live show March 23-- Get your tickets at loopedlive.com now! *this episode spills beans* (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
